title: Sync MCP implementation from upstash/context7 TypeScript

tasks.title: Environment preparation
tasks.description: Set network proxy, ensure `uv` installed, create/activate venv, sync deps with `uv sync --group test`.

tasks.title: Clone official TypeScript repo
tasks.description: Clone https://github.com/upstash/context7 into `upstash_context7` for reference (no install).

tasks.title: Review TS `packages/mcp` implementation
tasks.description: Map authentication, endpoints, headers and behaviors used by v2 API.

tasks.title: Align Python `mcp_server_context7.py` with TS behavior
tasks.description: Update headers/auth logic, normalize interfaces, keep Python-specific utilities (file save, repo sync).

tasks.title: Add/adjust tests
tasks.description: Expand `tests/` to cover new auth and v2 behavior; run pytest until green.

tasks.title: Commit and push branch
tasks.description: Create branch `feat/mcp-sync-from-ts`, commit changes with message `chore(mcp): sync implementation with upstash/context7@<commit>` and open PR.
